                                       )
                                       (
                                       P
                                       (
                                       1
                                       )
                                       -
                                       P
                                       (
                                       0
                                       )
                                       )
                                       ]
                                    
                                 
                              
                           

It is obvious that:
                                 
                                    
                                       E
                                       [
                                       ξ
                                       ]
                                       =
                                       E
                                       [
                                       E
                                       [
                                       θ
                                       ]
                                       ]
                                       =
                                       E
                                       
                                          
                                             
                                                
                                                   
                                                      
                                                         
                                                            a
                                                         
                                                         
                                                            ̃
                                                         
                                                      
                                                      +
                                                      
                                                         
                                                            b
                                                         
                                                         
                                                            ̃
                                                         
                                                      
                                                   
                                                   
                                                      2
                                                   
                                                
                                             
                                          
                                       
                                    
                                 
                              
                           

On the other hand, 
                                 
                                    
                                       
                                          
                                             
                                                a
                                             
                                             
                                                ̃
                                             
                                          
                                          +
                                          
                                             
                                                b
                                             
                                             
                                                ̃
                                             
                                          
                                       
                                       
                                          2
                                       
                                    
                                 
                               is a fuzzy variable and using fuzzy arithmetic it can be represented as follows:
                                 
                                    
                                       
                                          
                                             1
                                          
                                          
                                             2
                                          
                                       
                                       (
                                       
                                          
                                             a
                                          
                                          
                                             ̃
                                          
                                       
                                       +
                                       
                                          
                                             b
                                          
                                          
                                             ̃
                                          
                                       
                                       )
                                       =
                                       
                                          
                                             
                                                
                                                   
                                                      
                                                         
                                                            α
                                                         
                                                         
                                                            1
                                                         
                                                      
                                                      +
                                                      
                                                         
                                                            α
                                                         
                                                         
                                                            2
                                                         
                                                      
                                                   
                                                   
                                                      2
                                                   
                                                
                                                ,
                                                
                                                   
                                                      
                                                         
                                                            a
                                                         
                                                         
                                                            2
                                                         
                                                      
                                                      +
                                                      
                                                         
                                                            b
                                                         
                                                         
                                                            2
                                                         
                                                      
                                                   
                                                   
                                                      2
                                                   
                                                
                                                ,
                                                
                                                   
                                                      
                                                         
                                                            a
                                                         
                                                         
                                                            3
                                                         
                                                      
                                                      +
                                                      
                                                         
                                                            b
                                                         
                                                         
                                                            3
                                                         
                                                      
                                                   
                                                   
                                                      2
                                                   
                                                
                                                ,
                                                
                                                   
                                                      
                                                         
                                                            β
                                                         
                                                         
                                                            1
                                                         
                                                      
                                                      +
                                                      
                                                         
                                                            β
                                                         
                                                         
                                                            2
                                                         
                                                      
                                                   
                                                   
                                                      2
                                                   
                                                
                                             
                                          
                                       
                                    
                                 
                              
                           

Then, similar to Theorem 4, we have:
                                 
                                    
                                       E
                                       [
                                       ξ
                                       ]
                                       =
                                       
                                          
                                             1
                                          
                                          
                                             4
                                          
                                       
                                       [
                                       (
                                       
                                          
                                             a
                                          
                                          
                                             2
                                          
                                       
                                       +
                                       
                                          
                                             a
                                          
                                          
                                             3
                                          
                                       
                                       +
                                       
                                          
                                             b
                                          
                                          
                                             2
                                          
                                       
                                       +
                                       
                                          
                                             b
                                          
                                          
                                             3
                                          
                                       
                                       )
                                       +
                                       (
                                       
                                          
                                             α
                                          
                                          
                                             1
                                          
                                       
                                       +
                                       
                                          
                                             α
                                          
                                          
                                             2
                                          
                                       
                                       )
                                       (
                                       T
                                       (
                                       0
                                       )
                                       -
                                       T
                                       (
                                       1
                                       )
                                       )
                                       +
                                       (
                                       
                                          
                                             β
                                          
                                          
                                             1
                                          
                                       
                                       +
                                       
                                          
                                             β
                                          
                                          
                                             2
                                          
                                       
                                       )
                                       (
                                       P
                                       (
                                       1
                                       )
                                       -
                                       P
                                       (
                                       0
                                       )
                                       )
                                       ]
                                       
                                       □
                                    
                                 
                              
                           


                              Assume that ξ is the Ra-Fu variable with a normal distribution, denoted by 
                              
                                 
                                    ξ
                                    ∼
                                    N
                                    (
                                    
                                       
                                          μ
                                       
                                       
                                          ̃
                                       
                                    
                                    ,
                                    
                                       
                                          σ
                                       
                                       
                                          2
                                       
                                    
                                    )
                                 
                               
                              where 
                              
                                 
                                    
                                       
                                          μ
                                       
                                       
                                          ̃
                                       
                                    
                                    =
                                    (
                                    α
                                    ,
                                    
                                       
                                          λ
                                       
                                       
                                          2
                                       
                                    
                                    ,
                                    
                                       
                                          λ
                                       
                                       
                                          3
                                       
                                    
                                    ,
                                    β
                                    )
                                 
                               
                              is a LR fuzzy variable. Then the expected value of ξ is obtained as follows:
                              
                                 
                                    
                                       E
                                       [
                                       ξ
                                       ]
                                       =
                                       
                                          
                                             1
                                          
                                          
                                             2
                                          
                                       
                                       [
                                       (
                                       
                                          
                                             λ
                                          
                                          
                                             3
                                          
                                       
                                       +
                                       
                                          
                                             λ
                                          
                                          
                                             2
                                          
                                       
                                       )
                                       +
                                       α
                                       (
                                       T
                                       (
                                       0
                                       )
                                       -
                                       T
                                       (
                                       1
                                       )
                                       )
                                       +
                                       β
                                       (
                                       P
                                       (
                                       1
                                       )
                                       -
                                       P
                                       (
                                       0
                                       )
                                       )
                                       ]
                                       .
                                    
                                 
                              
                           

Follows directly from the application of Theorem 4 to a normal distribution.□

Uncertainty, vagueness, or imprecision arises when the outcome of an experiment cannot be determined properly. The Ra-Fu variable developed by Kwakernaak [31,32] is one way to handle the uncertainties associated with a random variable whose value is a fuzzy number. The uncertain mathematical model consisting of the Ra-Fu variables can be converted into a deterministic model using the expected value operator of Ra-Fu variables. The general Ra-Fu mathematical model can be formulated as follows:
                           
                              (6)
                              
                                 
                                    
                                       
                                          
                                             
                                                max
                                             
                                          
                                       
                                       
                                          
                                             
                                             f
                                             (
                                             x
                                             ,
                                             ξ
                                             )
                                          
                                       
                                    
                                    
                                       
                                          
                                             s.t.
                                          
                                       
                                       
                                          
                                             
                                             
                                                
                                                   
                                                      
                                                         
                                                            
                                                               
                                                                  
                                                                     g
                                                                  
                                                                  
                                                                     j
                                                                  
                                                               
                                                               (
                                                               x
                                                               ,
                                                               ξ
                                                               )
                                                               ⩽
                                                               0
                                                               ,
                                                               
                                                               j
                                                               =
                                                               1
                                                               ,
                                                               …
                                                               ,
                                                               n
                                                            
                                                         
                                                         
                                                            
                                                               x
                                                               ∈
                                                               X
                                                            
                                                         
                                                      
                                                   
                                                
                                             
                                          
                                       
                                    
                                 
                              
                           
                        where f(x,
                        ξ) and g
                        
                           j
                        (x,
                        ξ),
                        j
                        =1,…,
                        n present continuous functions in X and ξ
                        =(ξ
                        1,
                        ξ
                        2,…,
                        ξ
                        
                           n
                        ) is a Ra-Fu vector on the possibility space (Θ,
                        P(Θ),
                        Pos). In order to obtain the crisp form of (6), the corresponding Ra-Fu expected value can be calculated from:
                           
                              (7)
                              
                                 
                                    
                                       
                                          
                                             
                                                max
                                             
                                          
                                       
                                       
                                          
                                             
                                             E
                                             [
                                             f
                                             (
                                             x
                                             ,
                                             ξ
                                             )
                                             ]
                                          
                                       
                                    
                                    
                                       
                                          
                                             s.t.
                                          
                                       
                                       
                                          
                                             
                                             
                                                
                                                   
                                                      
                                                         
                                                            
                                                               E
                                                               [
                                                               
                                                                  
                                                                     g
                                                                  
                                                                  
                                                                     j
                                                                  
                                                               
                                                               (
                                                               x
                                                               ,
                                                               ξ
                                                               )
                                                               ]
                                                               ⩽
                                                               0
                                                               ,
                                                               
                                                               j
                                                               =
                                                               1
                                                               ,
                                                               …
                                                               ,
                                                               n
                                                            
                                                         
                                                         
                                                            
                                                               x
                                                               ∈
                                                               X
                                                            
                                                         
                                                      
                                                   
                                                
                                             
                                          
                                       
                                    
                                 
                              
                           
                        
                     

Using the expected value operator, Model (6) has been converted into a certain programming model in order to obtain a numerical solution.

In this sub-section, we develop a DEA-based method for evaluating the efficiencies of DMUs where the inputs and outputs are characterized by the Ra-Fu variables with three different distributions: Poisson, normal and uniform.

Assume that there are n DMUs (j
                        =1,…,
                        n) to be assessed, each using amounts 
                           
                              
                                 
                                    
                                       
                                          
                                             
                                                x
                                             
                                             
                                                ¯
                                             
                                          
                                       
                                       
                                          ̃
                                       
                                    
                                 
                                 
                                    ij
                                 
                              
                           
                         of m Ra-Fu inputs (i
                        =1,…,
                        m) to produce amounts 
                           
                              
                                 
                                    
                                       
                                          
                                             
                                                y
                                             
                                             
                                                ¯
                                             
                                          
                                       
                                       
                                          ̃
                                       
                                    
                                 
                                 
                                    rj
                                 
                              
                           
                         of s Ra-Fu outputs (r
                        =1,…,
                        s). The following Ra-Fu CCR model results from consideration of the Ra-Fu inputs and outputs for DMU
                        ∘:

                                          ,
                                          
                                             
                                                y
                                             
                                             
                                                rj

                                                      β
                                                   
                                                   
                                                      ¯
                                                   
                                                
                                             
                                          
                                       
                                    
                                 
                                 
                                    LR
                                 
                              
                           
                         are the LR trapezoidal fuzzy numbers.

We should note that in all three models, the under assessment is said to be efficient if the corresponding optimal solution is equal to unity; otherwise, DMU
                        ∘ is inefficient.

In this section we develop an imprecise DEA-based formulation for dealing with the randomness of fuzzy parameters on a possibility space (Θ,
                     P(Θ),
                     Pos) through efficiency measurement. Let us consider n DMUs, indexed by j
                     =1,…,
                     n, where each of them consumes m different Ra-Fu inputs, indexed by 
                        
                           
                              
                                 
                                    
                                       
                                          
                                             x
                                          
                                          
                                             ¯
                                          
                                       
                                    
                                    
                                       ̃
                                    
                                 
                              
                              
                                 ij
                              
                           
                           (
                           i
                           =
                           1
                           ,
                           …
                           ,
                           m
                           )
                        
                     , to secure s different Ra-Fu outputs indexed by 
                        
                           
                              
                                 
                                    
                                       
                                          
                                             y
                                          
                                          
                                             ¯
                                          
                                       
                                    
                                    
                                       ̃
                                    
                                 
                              
                              
                                 rj
                              
                           
                        
                      (r
                     =1,…,s). We construct the following generic DEA model, called the Possibility–Probability Constrained Programming (PPCP) model as follows:
                        
                           (10)

                                          =

                                          .
                                       
                                    
                                 
                              
                           
                        
                     where δ and γ are a pre-specified minimum probability level and a pre-specified acceptable level of possibility, respectively, and vary between [0,1]. These parameters, assumed known a priori, are also called the threshold (or aspiration) levels. Let us assume that the inputs and outputs have normal distributions 
                        
                           
                              
                                 
                                    
                                       
                                          
                                             x
                                          
                                          
                                             ¯
                                          
                                       
                                    
                                    
                                       ̃
                                    
                                 
                              
                              
                                 ij
                              
                           
                           ∼
                           N
                           
                              
                                 
                                    
                                       
                                          
                                             
                                                x
                                             
                                             
                                                ¯
                                             
                                          
                                       
                                       
                                          ij
                                       
                                    
                                    ,
                                    
                                       
                                          
                                             
                                                σ
                                             
                                             
                                                ¯
                                             
                                          
                                       
                                       
                                          ij
                                       
                                       
                                          2
                                       
                                    
                                 
                              
                           
                        
                      and 
                        
                           
                              
                                 
                                    
                                       
                                          
                                             y
                                          
                                          
                                             ¯
                                          
                                       
                                    
                                    
                                       ̃
                                    
                                 
                              
                              
                                 rj
                              
                           
                           ∼
                           N
                           
                              
                                 
                                    
                                       
                                          
                                             
                                                y
                                             
                                             
                                                ¯
                                             
                                          
                                       
                                       
                                          rj
                                       
                                    
                                    ,
                                    
                                       
                                          
                                             
                                                σ
                                             
                                             
                                                ¯
                                             
                                          
                                       
                                       
                                          rj
                                       
                                       
                                          2
                                       
                                    
                                 
                              
                           
                        
                      where

                        Theorem 5
                        
                           Suppose that

                           are the Ra-Fu generalized left right fuzzy numbers with normal distributions and the mean and variance of

                           where “P” presents probability, δ is a pre-specified minimum probability, “Pos” and “Nec” stands for possibility and necessity, and γ is a pre-specified acceptable level of possibility or necessity.
                        


                           See 
                           Appendix A.□

We apply the first part of Theorem 5 to the Ra-Fu CCR Model (10) to obtain the following two deterministic equivalent models in the presence of Ra-Fu inputs and outputs:

Obviously, Models (13) and (14) are non-linear programming models because of the lower and upper bounds of the above intervals. These non-linear programming models can be transformed into quadratic programming models by using the following substitutions:
                        
                           (a)
                           In Model (13): 
                                 
                                    
                                       
                                          
                                             
                                                
                                                   
                                                      θ
                                                   
                                                   
                                                      ∘
                                                   
                                                   
                                                      O
                                                   
                                                
                                             
                                          
                                       
                                       
                                          2
                                       
                                    
                                    =
                                    
                                       
                                          
                                             
                                                
                                                   
                                                      
                                                         
                                                            
                                                               
                                                                  σ
                                                               
                                                               
                                                                  ∘
                                                               
                                                               
                                                                  O
                                                               
                                                            
                                                            (
                                                            u
                                                            ,
                                                            φ
                                                            )
                                                         
                                                      
                                                   
                                                   
                                                      δ
                                                   
                                                   
                                                      L
                                                   
                                                
                                             
                                          
                                       
                                       
                                          2
                                       
                                    
                                    ,
                                    
                                    
                                       
                                          
                                             
                                                
                                                   
                                                      θ
                                                   
                                                   
                                                      ∘
                                                   
                                                   
                                                      I
                                                   
                                                
                                             
                                          
                                       
                                       
                                          2
                                       
                                    
                                    =
                                    
                                       
                                          
                                             
                                                
                                                   
                                                      
                                                         
                                                            
                                                               
                                                                  σ
                                                               
                                                               
                                                                  ∘
                                                               
                                                               
                                                                  I
                                                               
                                                            
                                                            (
                                                            v
                                                            )
                                                         
                                                      
                                                   
                                                   
                                                      δ
                                                   
                                                   
                                                      L
                                                   
                                                
                                             
                                          
                                       
                                       
                                          2
                                       
                                    
                                 
                               and 
                                 
                                    
                                       
                                          (
                                          
                                             
                                                λ

In Model (14): 
                                 
                                    
                                       
                                          
                                             
                                                
                                                   
                                                      
                                                         
                                                            θ

By applying the above substitutions to Models (13) and (14), respectively, the following quadratic programming problems can be formulated:
                        
                           (15)
                           
                              
                                 
                                    
                                       
                                          
                                             
                                                
                                                   max
                                                
                                                
                                                   δ
                                                   >

We should note that the DMU
                     ∘ is called possibilistic–probabilistic γ–δ efficient if the objective function of Model (15) or Model (16), φ, is greater than or equal to one at the possibility level γ and probability level δ; otherwise, it is called possibilistic–probabilistic γ–δ inefficient.

In addition to the PPCP Model (10) with possibility–probability constraints, we present a Necessity–Probability Constrained Programming (NPCP) model under fuzzy probability necessity constraints as follows:

In order to define the necessity-probabilistic γ–δ efficient DMU
                     ∘, we can normalize the efficiency as 
                        
                           
                              
                                 φ
                              
                              
                                 ∘
                              
                           
                           =
                           
                              
                                 
                                    
                                       φ
                                    
                                    
                                       ¯
                                    
                                 
                              
                              
                                 ∘
                              
                           
                           /
                           
                              
                                 max
                              
                              
                                 j
                              
                           
                           (
                           
                              
                                 
                                    
                                       φ
                                    
                                    
                                       ¯
                                    
                                 
                              
                              
                                 j
                              
                           
                           )
                        
                     . As a result, DMU
                     ∘ is necessity-probabilistic γ–δ efficient if φ
                     ∘
                     =1; otherwise, it is called necessity-probabilistic γ–δ inefficient.

In the previous section, we discussed the CCR model in which the inputs and outputs are Ra-Fu variables on a possibility space (Θ,
                     P(Θ),
                     Pos) with a normal distribution. In a general setting, the probability levels may be unknown or imprecise, in particular for fuzzy and stochastic production sets. Hence, we develop the proposed models with the fuzzy threshold level to take into account the generalized DEA model. Let us keep our earlier assumptions as well as the fuzzy δ, denoted by 
                        
                           
                              
                                 δ
                              
                              
                                 ̃
                              
                           
                           =
                           
                              
                                 
                                    
                                       
                                          δ
                                       
                                       
                                          α
                                       
                                    
                                    ,
                                    
                                       
                                          δ
                                       
                                       
                                          
                                             
                                                m
                                             
                                             
                                                1
                                             
                                          
                                       
                                    
                                    ,
                                    
                                       
                                          δ
                                       
                                       
                                          
                                             
                                                m
                                             
                                             
                                                2
                                             
                                          
                                       
                                    
                                    ,
                                    
                                       
                                          δ
                                       
                                       
                                          β
                                       
                                    
                                 
                              
                           
                        
                     , to derive the following PPCP model:
                        
                           (20)
                           
                              
                                 
                                    
                                       
                                          
                                             max
                                          
                                       
                                    
                                    
                                       
                                          
                                          φ
                                       
                                    
                                 
                                 
                                    
                                       
                                          s.t.
                                       
                                    
                                    
                                       
                                          
                                          Pos
                                          
                                             
                                                
                                                   P
                                                   
                                                      
                                                         
                                                            φ

We propose Theorem 6 below in order to achieve the deterministic form of Model (20) involving the fuzzy threshold level.
                        Theorem 6
                        
                           Let 
                           
                              
                                 
                                    
                                       
                                          
                                             λ
                                          
                                          
                                             ¯
                                          
                                       
                                    
                                    
                                       1
                                    
                                 
                              
                            
                           and 
                           
                              
                                 
                                    
                                       
                                          
                                             λ
                                          
                                          
                                             ¯
                                          
                                       
                                    
                                    
                                       2
                                    
                                 
                              
                            
                           be two independently Ra-Fu generalized left right fuzzy numbers with normal distributions, denoted by 
                           
                              
                                 
                                    
                                       
                                          
                                             
                                                
                                                   λ
                                                
                                                
                                                   ¯
                                                
                                             
                                          
                                          
                                             ̃
                                          
                                       
                                    
                                    
                                       1
                                    
                                 
                                 ∼
                                 N
                                 
                                    
                                       
                                          
                                             
                                                
                                                   
                                                      μ
                                                   
                                                   
                                                      ¯
                                                   
                                                
                                             
                                             
                                                1
                                             
                                          
                                          ,
                                          
                                             
                                                
                                                   
                                                      σ
                                                   
                                                   
                                                      ¯
                                                   
                                                
                                             
                                             
                                                1
                                             
                                             
                                                2
                                             
                                          
                                       
                                    
                                 
                              
                            
                           and 
                           
                              
                                 
                                    
                                       
                                          
                                             
                                                
                                                   λ
                                                
                                                
                                                   ¯
                                                
                                             
                                          
                                          
                                             ̃
                                          
                                       
                                    
                                    
                                       2
                                    
                                 
                                 ∼
                                 N
                                 
                                    
                                       
                                          
                                             
                                                
                                                   
                                                      μ
                                                   
                                                   
                                                      ¯
                                                   
                                                
                                             
                                             
                                                2
                                             
                                          
                                          ,
                                          
                                             
                                                
                                                   
                                                      σ
                                                   
                                                   
                                                      ¯
                                                   
                                                
                                             
                                             
                                                2
                                             
                                             
                                                2
                                             
                                          
                                       
                                    
                                 
                              
                            
                           where 
                           
                              
                                 
                                    
                                       
                                          
                                             μ
                                          
                                          
                                             ¯
                                          
                                       
                                    
                                    
                                       1
                                    
                                 
                                 =
                                 
                                    
                                       
                                          
                                             
                                                λ
                                             
                                             
                                                1
                                             
                                             
                                                α
                                             
                                          
                                          ,
                                          
                                             
                                                λ
                                             
                                             
                                                1
                                             
                                             
                                                
                                                   
                                                      m
                                                   
                                                   
                                                      1
                                                   
                                                
                                             
                                          
                                          ,
                                          
                                             
                                                λ

Assume that there are n DMUs (j
                     =1,…,
                     n) with m Ra-Fu inputs (i
                     =1,…,
                     m) and s Ra-Fu outputs (r
                     =1,…,
                     s). The Ra-Fu inputs and Ra-Fu outputs are normally distributed with fuzzy mean and fuzzy variance as follows:

Because of 
                        
                           
                              
                                 (
                                 
                                    
                                       σ
                                    
                                    
                                       ∘
                                    
                                 
                                 (
                                 u
                                 )
                                 )
